channel.title: The great act of celebration!
channel.description:
To celebrate free trade coming back, i'm planning to hold an event to show the newer players that this update is a good thing! Essentially what i'll be doing is, buy addy/rune armor for about 1m and then give it away to newcomes in lumbridge on f2p. It would be cool if we could get a group of people doing this in order to accomplish this goal.
I'm just sick of all these newfags bitching about how the PK's are the only ones gaining anything by this update, and i intend to prove them wrong.

item.title: The great act of celebration!
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:13, topic:375258”]“Hi, we are from a RS Cheating and Private Server community(biggest one out there named after car parts!!) and we have decided to help the community. Come join in the fun and receive free items!”[/quote]I love it!

Read full topic

item.title: The great act of celebration!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

A charity even brought to you by a RS cheating site. Love the idea.

We’ll have to post this on dummy accounts on the RS Forums as well.

“Hi, we are from a RS Cheating and Private Server community(biggest one out there named after car parts!!) and we have decided to help the community. Come join in the fun and receive free items!”

Read full topic

item.title: The great act of celebration!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Btw, good way to collect us all in one world and area so Jagex can drop a ban hammer.

Just kidding. I don’t think they’d ban those of us that have legitimately played accounts. XD

Read full topic

item.title: The great act of celebration!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

How about armour up to adamantite, and scimitars from mithril to rune? Presuming you give them numerous sets, I mean.
If you start with iron armour then they benefit immediately – just make sure they bank the stuff in lumbridge castle before going off to fight.

Read full topic

but yes, i have a few spare mils to do this. TBH should give a few free items, a starter pack as such.[/quote]Yeah, i’m considering giving away iron/steel/mith/addy/rune sets and one scimmy of each tier as well. That would be pretty beneficial!
